Minima - my template

This is my take on a minimal Jekyll template. I tried to include all the things I usually need to add when I make a blog site: tags functionality, an about page, a tag page, an author page, and some light formatting - although I did my best to keep everything true to the original, because everything after that is subjective. I documented the changes I made to the base template for posterity.
